original_text: And Rehoboam slept with his fathers and was buried in the city of David, and Abijah his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 르호보암이 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 다윗 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 아비야가 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Rehoboam slept with his fathers
and was buried in the city of David
and Abijah his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아비야가 그를 대신하여 통치하였다
